mema thaththwaya yatathe muslim sambhawak sahitha piris wetha pruthugrisingen balapam ella wannata wiya.mema thaththwayata muhuna dima sadaha muslim jathikayan shri lankawe weralabada kalapa wala sita rata thulata ha nagenahira pradesha walata sankramanaya wiya.warthamanaye di muslim jathikayange awashyatha wuwamana pilibandawa wadi duratath soya balima sadaha 1980 di 'muslim aagamika saha sanskruthika katayuthu pilibanda departhumenthuwa' aarambha karana ladi.
